data.text: Asafi a fala ɲaxumɛna.
N sandane nan sama.
En bata feen naxanye mɛ,
en mi ne luxunɲɛ en ma diine ma.
A bata tɔnne so Yaxuba bɔnsɔnna yii.
alogo muxu famatɔne xa e kolon.
Nayi, e fan e yigi sama Ala fari nɛn.
Nayi, e mi luma
Xanla yi Efirami bɔnsɔnna muxun naxanye yii,
E Alaa layirin nabeɲin,
E ɲinan nɛn Ala kɛwanle xɔn,
A kabanako feene liga nɛn
A yi fɔxɔ igeni taxun a tagi
A ti e yɛɛ ra yanyin na kundani.
A fanyeni bɔ tonbonni,
A yi xuden namini gɛmɛne yi,
Koni e lu yulubin ligɛ a ra,
E yi a nata, a e xa Ala bunba,
E yi Ala mafala, e naxa,
A to gɛmɛn bɔ,
Na ma, Alatala e xuiin mɛxina, a fitina.
Amasɔtɔ e mi yi laxi Ala ra,
Koni a yi kuyen yamari,
a yi Manna donseen nagodo e ma,
Adamadiine yi malekane burun don.
Ala yi foyen nafa keli sogetede binna ra.
A yi xɔline ragodo e ma
E yi yolon e daaxaden tagi e bubune rabilinni.
Yamaan yi e dɛge han e lugo.
Koni benun e xa wasa, donseen mɔn yi e dɛ,
Ala yi xɔlɔ e ma, a yi e sɛnbɛmane faxa,
Hali na birin to liga,
Nayi, a yi e dunuɲa yi gidin lu fuuni,
A to ndee faxa,
A yi rabira e ma
Koni e falane mi yi fixaxi,
E mako mi yi Alaa fe yi,
Koni bayo a kininkinin,
A a kolon fa fala daɲɔxɔn nan tun e ra,
E murutɛ Ala ma nɛn tonbonni sanɲa ma wuyaxi.
E yi Ala bunbama yɛ yo yɛ.
E ɲinan nɛn a sɛnbɛ gbeen xɔn,
E ɲinan nɛn a taxamasenne xɔn Misiran yi,
A yi e baane findi wunla ra.
A tugetuge xɔlɛne rasiga e ma
A e siseene so suɲɛne yii.
A yi e wudi binle kala balabalan kɛsɛne ra.
A yi e ɲingene faxa balabalan kɛsɛne ra.
A fitinaxin yi a xɔlɔ ɲaxin
A mi xɛtɛ a xɔlɔn fɔxɔ ra,
A yi dii sarane faxa Misiran denbayaan birin yi.
A yi fa a yamaan na
A yi ti e yɛɛ ra, sese mi e sɔtɔ,
A yi fa e ra a bɔxɔ sariɲanxini
A siya gbɛtɛne kedi nɛn a yamaan yɛɛ ra,
Koni e yi murutɛ Kore Xɔnna Ala ma,
e yi e masiga a ra,
E Ala raxɔlɔ nɛn e suxure batudene ra.
Ala to na mɛ, a yi xɔlɔ han!
A yi a banxin nabeɲin naxan Silo yi,
A yi tin a sɛnbɛ kankiraan yi suxu.
A yi tin a muxune yi faxa silanfanna ra,
Tɛɛn yi e banxulanne gan,
Saraxaraline yi faxa silanfanna ra.
Dɔnxɛn na, Marigin yi keli
A mɔn yi a yaxune kedi.
A yi a mɛ Yusufu bɔnsɔnna ra.
A Yuda bɔnsɔnna nan sugandi
A yi a Yire Sariɲanxin ti mɛnni
A yi a walikɛɛn Dawuda sugandi.
A yi a tongo xuruse kantandeni,
Dawuda yi a ɲɔxɔ lu e xɔn ma ɲɛnige faɲini.
